name: space-boss-fighter
description: This game is a **space shooter** where you can fly on your own space ship through levels. You wil meet a lot of enemies who will try to kill you, so you need to shoot them first. Also you will find different power-ups with positive or negative bonuses and also with different types of weapons. In the end of the level you will meet the boss, after killing him next level will be opened.
author: Oleh Shalyhin
